description: This file contains Django REST Framework view functions for managing products, including listing, creating, retrieving, updating, deleting products, and calculating total inventory balance.

methods.name: health
methods.description: A simple health check endpoint that returns server status.

methods.name: products_list_create
methods.description: Handles listing all products or creating a new product based on HTTP method.

methods.name: product_detail
methods.description: Retrieves, updates, or deletes a specific product by ID.

methods.name: products_total_balance
methods.description: Calculates and returns the total inventory value as a string with two decimal places.
